title: Travel + Country Dingbat recommendations?
content:
Not exactly a type ID, but I wasn't sure where else to post this. I'm looking for a nice, sleek set of travel/map and country (maybe flags??) dingbats for use in an upcoming project. Any recommendations will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!
author: showandtell

comments.content:
Do you mean something like the [National Codes](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/national-codes/) used on bumper stickers and license plates? I don't know of flag dingbats. I assumed you weren't talking about travel signage (restrooms, escalators, etc).

- Mike Yanega
National Codes may work, thanks. Yes, I am also looking for something along the lines of travel signage, more like 'restaurant' 'hotel' etc....anyone know of anything?
Plugging 'travel' into MyFonts' search feature yields several possibilities. Howzabout [these](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065651/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/glyphyx-nf/).
